data.title: #SURNAMES BREWER, CARPENTER, CHANDLER, FRY, GOSLETT, HAGUE, JOYCE, KILBY, MILES, NEATE, SHERWOOD
data.text:
Good evening listers

I am looking for (in any spelling) and specifically these locations:

BREWER Biddestone and Hilmarton

CARPENTER Hill Deverill, North Bradley, Westbury (and Rhondda Valley GLA)

CHANDLER Chippenham

FRY Hullavington, (Shipton Moyne & Wickwar GLS)

GOSLETT Sherston Magna

HAGUE Dilton

JOYCE Upton Scudamore

KILBY Marshfield and Slaughterford

MILES Kington St Michael

NEATE Slaughterford

SHERWOOD Sherston Magna

I think I’ve got to the limits of what Ancestry has to offer and so it’s back to primary sources and to the Wiltshire & Swindon History Centre! All leads gratefully appreciated as I’ve been searching for nearly 20 years and have got plenty of brick walls (as well as plenty of info) to share!.

Many thanks in anticipation

Chris Fowler

Wimborne

Dorset

Hello Chris,

I was interested to read your message and noted that you think you have exhausted what is available about Wiltshire on Ancestry.

You may be unaware that FindMyPast has a vast amount of transcriptions from the Wiltshire parish registers and other sources?

If you are not a subscriber you may find your local library has access.

Regards, Rod in Andover.
